1.content: First off, are you a boy or girl.
1.title: The beginning

121.content:
Here's 2 ideas that can work (you can add more)

Anthro: All girls are half-human but half animal of their choosing.

Giant monsters: Here, the girls are over 100ft tall, and have super poses like monster roars, hyper beams from mouth and shooting lasers from eyes.

125.title: Adult (over 21)

info.brief_description: Everyday, we wonder if worlds different from ours exist. This is my imaging of that idea.
info.description:
The brief description pretty much told you all you need to know, except for the following rules;

1. The story you can write can get dark at times, but if its too dark for the readers, I'm kicking you out.

2. The story takes place in a world unlike ours. While anything is possible, don't get TOO wild now.

3. and Most importantly, have fun!
